thank_you_intro1: You are now ready to begin learning English with KidsLoop! To use your pass, log in to the KidsLoop ESL™ application.
thank_you_intro2: KidsLoop Learning Applications can also be individually downloaded and accessed with the same login credentials.
thank_you_promo1: As a token of our appreciation, please accept this holiday coupon code for $20 off your next KidsLoop Gift Toys Package purchase. Enter the code MerryBadaChristmas when you check out.
thank_you_promo2: This offer is only valid until January 31, 2020.
